amendatorysection.catchline: Eligibility to register as online notary public; qualifications.
amendatorysection.para: (1) To be eligible to register as an online notary public, a person shall:
(a) Hold a valid commission as a notary public in the State of Nebraska;
(b) Satisfy the education requirement of section 64-404; and
(c) Pay the fee required under section 64-405.
(2) The Secretary of State shall not accept the registration if the requirements of subsection (1) of this section are not met.
